name: Water Sort Puzzle (itch)
description:
Water Sort Free is a fun and addictive puzzle game! Try to classify the colors in the glass until all the colors are the same. A challenging but relaxing game - pouring water - to train your brain. Each water pipe will have different color bars, quickly classify the water and then pour water into each pipe to complete your game.

Water Sorting is a simple puzzle game. Sort the water into the right tubes until there is only one color per tube. Puzzle Sorting won’t let you place two with different colors directly next to one another, so you’ll have to think logically and find your own way to sort the water.
